idea-plugin.name: React Css Modules All
idea-plugin.description:
CSS Modules support for React/JavaScript projects

Enhance your CSS Modules development experience with intelligent code assistance.

Features

  • Smart Completion - Auto-complete CSS class names from imported style modules
  • Dual Syntax Support - Works with both styles['className'] and styles.className
  • Go to Definition - Click on class name to navigate directly to CSS/SCSS definition
  • Unknown Class Detection - Highlights undefined CSS classes with warnings
  • Quick Fix - Instantly create missing CSS selectors with one click
  • Parent Selector Support - Full support for SCSS/LESS & (parent selector) syntax
  • Hover Documentation - Preview CSS rules on mouse hover

Supported File Types

  • CSS, SCSS, LESS modules
  • JavaScript, TypeScript, JSX, TSX
